mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (userid, userpw, username, useremail) values (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{useremail})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_member where userid=#{userid} and userpw=#{userpw}
mapper.update: update tbl_member set username=#{username}, useremail=#{useremail}, updatedate=now() where userid=#{userid} and userpw=#{userpw}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_member where userid=#{userid} and userpw=#{userpw}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_member order by regdate
